title: SOLD - lot of 27 G-VG/EX T205 Gold Borders w/ SP
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD - lot of 27 G-VG/EX T205 Gold Borders w/ SP
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a lot of 27 T205 Piedmont commons.   Most are in good to VG/EX condition, w/ the exception of one of the Becks, which appears to have been trimmed on top.  Most are very nicely centered w/ very little chipping.

The lot does include a few key cards.  Doc Crandall is the rarer "Crossed T" variation.  Harry Krause is also a tougher card.  The Admiral Schlei has a Factory No 42 Piedmont back.

Looking for $XXX for the lot, which works out to $XX.XX a card + a little for shipping.  I would prefer to not break up the lot, so please don't ask unless you are making a strong offer on a specific card.  Paypal friend /no fee is preferred.

You will not be disappointed in the quality of these cards.

First to PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with an "I'll take it!" will be the new owner.

See scans below for condition or ask me if you need any additional details.

[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_1.jpg[/img][img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_1_back.jpg[/img]

[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_2.jpg[/img][img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_2_back.jpg[/img]

[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_3.jpg[/img][img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T205_Lot_3_back.jpg[/img]

Nice lot but just want to let you know that Krause is not tough...it is rather common.

Joshua

[quote name="Wite3" post=1296312]Nice lot but just want to let you know that Krause is not tough...it is rather common.

Joshua[/QUOTE]

Thanks Joshua - I was going almost strictly by external pricing sources; not trying to deceive.  Any reason there's a slight premium for Krause (or is t205.org simply incorrect)?  Poor choice of words in my original post, for sure, but I'll leave it there since you called me out on it!  ;)

Derek,
I think T205.org got it wrong...the Krause is not the easiest common to come by but it is certainly not tough or a single print...

The last three I bought were for under $15 each and ranged from fair to g-vg. Single prints in similar condition bring nearly twice that amount.

Good luck with your lot...it is nice and I wish i had the money!

Joshua
